title: Miniature bunny | 1:12 scale rabbit figurine | Handmade miniature animal dollhouse decor
description: This tiny 1:12 scale bunny is sculpted by hand from high-quality polymer clay and then carefully covered with fine natural fibers to create a soft, realistic fur texture. The bunny is hand-painted with professional paints, giving it lifelike shading, expressive features, and a warm, natural color pattern. Perfect as a dollhouse animal, miniature woodland scene accessory, fairy garden decoration, or a unique collectible for miniature lovers. Not a toy — not suitable for child…
